title: How to Help Your Angry Child, Part 2
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary:
Anger in kids may be confusing, because parents don't always understand where it's coming from or how to resolve it. John and Danny explain triggers that can turn a small situation into a whirlwind of anger, and provide solutions for calming the storms.
Featuring Tricia Goyer.

Receive the book Calming Angry Kids for your donation of any amount!

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
